string-array.name: on_boarding_text
string-array.item: I\'m your new personal assistant. How do I work?
Simply silence your device and I\'ll respond to incoming calls and texts for you. Try it out!
Well done! From now on, whenever your phone is silenced, I\'ll let your friends know you\'re away.. Automatically!
To exit Pause, simply unsilence your device. Go ahead! Turn me off!
Well done! Now, who would you like me to respond to?
